textPlain: It seems to update fast, but with significant ghosting, right? Looking at the cat example. Maybe this is just the best e-ink can do, and thats fine!

It looks amazing for e-ink. You'd probably not want this for video anyway, besides it's not even in color. I'm impressed that it works at all. For a lot of work though it could be amazing, depending on your environment.Say you'd want to pop outside in the nice weather to do some programming. You quickly find why that was a bad idea. But if you had a laptop with such a screen, I would expect it to work great.
